title: Eyes: their structure and care
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Eye - Care and hygiene

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Vision disorders
description: A farsighted young boy visits an optometrist and learns about the importance of protecting his eyes. The optometrist reviews the structure of the eyes, explains how the optical system functions, and discusses the cause of myopia, hyperopia, and astigmatism. Describes the work of an optometrist, and ophthalmologist, and an optician.
